Name: Orcs
Attack: Move 1. Deal 2 Melee damage
Special: EASILY AMBUSHED | If attacking them when revealed and they are at full health, +1 damage per stack.

Name: Sappers
Attack: Move 1. Deal 2 Damage to Mines.
Retaliate: ROCK THROWERS. Deal 1 damage. Deal another 1 damage if this spell had Stone.

Name: Skeleton Archers
Attack: Deal 3 Ranged damage.
Retaliate: Any player at range takes 1 damage.
Special: FIRE RESISTANT | Reduce damage from Fire attacks by 2.

Name: Adepts
Attack: Deal 3 Ranged damage
Retaliate: Deal 1 damage to a Mage job.
Special: MAGIC RESISTANT | The maximum number of stacks a spell can cast on Adepts is 2.

Name: Commander
Attack: Move 1. Deal 1 damage to the player with the lowest health.
Retaliate: Deal damage equal to your Mage recruitment

Name: Forgefiends
Attack: Add a Shield token to every other division

Name: Wargs
Attack: Move 1. Players collectively take 4 damage to Workers

Name: Falconers
Attack: Players take 2 Ranged Damage to Workers
Retaliate: Deal damage equal to half of the damage taken, rounded down.

Name: Small Ooze
Attack: Deal 1 damage

Name: Marauders
Attack: Deal damage equal to total Resources taken

Name: Decoys
Attack: Do the FEINT action on this division and another.
Special: FEINT When revealed, make all other cards in this Division face-down, then shuffle them and place them beneath this card.

Name: Ogres
Attack: Move 1. Deal 3 Melee damage to Workers.
Special: EASILY AMBUSHED | If attacking them when revealed and they are at full health, +1 damage per stack.

Name: Pyromancers
Attack: Apply Burning to two adjacent players.  Deal 2 damage to each of those players.
Retaliate: If player has any Fire, deal 2 Damage and apply Burning.

Name: Armored Hobgoblins
Attack: If they have no Shield, deal 1 Melee damage. Otherwise, deal 4 Melee Damage.
Retaliate: If this attack broke their shield, deal 1 Melee Damage.
Special: SHIELD-OBSESSED | After revealed, or at round start, gain a shield token if they do not already have one.

Name: Dark Mage
Attack: Players collectively discard Resources equal to the number of non-retreating Divisions.
Retaliate: Player discards a Resource token and takes a Wither token.
Special: FIGUREHEAD | When defeated, his entire division is defeated.

Name: Orc Rangers
Attack: Deal 5 Ranged damage to the player farthest away
Special: ORCS | When defeated, replace this card with a face-up Orc

Name: Berserkers
Attack: Deal Ranged or Melee damage equal to the number of hitpoints below the maximum health.
Retaliate: Take 2 Damage, to a minimum of 1 hitpiont.

Name: Siege Machines
Attack: Two players each take 2 damage

Name: Abomination
Attack: Deal 3 Melee damage. Player with the fewest Resources takes a Fear token

Name: Large Ooze
Attack: Players collectively take 3 damage
Special: SPLIT | Upon death, create a new Division two Small Oozes
